name: Below Hero
description:
Hello, 

This is a submission to Lame Jam 26 with the theme of controlling the environment. Why not control the environment by saving it? That's the goal of this game. The player must collect trash and destroy boats from overfishing to save the ocean. Watch out for sharks though!

Controls: WASD to move, Left-Click to collect trash, Right-Click to destroy boats.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits:

Developer: Daatster#7749

Art: _RadLad

Game Design: TrizzleG
